column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////My dude said the iced latte was one of the best he's had in Houston - he's really particular. It was described as "pleasantly mild" in terms of coffee flavor
column2: with the right amount of creamy mouth feel
column3: and blah blah blah. He went on and on. So apparently go with that
column4: if you're into girly milky coffee drinks like the man I plan to marry. *facepalm
